tr.td: Diabetes with complaints of blurred vision and halos around lights at night. Annual dilated diabetic eye exam.
Gooddoc, Joseph 800 Spring St. Atlanta, GA 30308 Phone: 843-385-3448
Seemore, Yul 25 Fall St. Atlanta, GA 30308 Phone: 843-555-9876
Patient states father and uncle both had significant problems with vision from diabetes that started well before they were ready to retire.
She states she is having trouble controlling her glucose at home. She travels a lot for work and has more difficulty maintaining control when traveling.
Patient has fears regarding vision loss.
Patient is having difficulty balancing lifestyle changes with work.

paragraph.content: Goals were updated to better meet patient's lifestyle and encourage better compliance.

tr.td: Determine the cause of visual complaint.
Diabetes with complaints of blurred vision and halos around lights at night. Annual dilated diabetic eye exam.
